A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved it start to finish. A step up from episode 7 which lacked originality. This stays loyal to the franchise while expanding the storyline and finally explaining the force. I don't understand all the negative reviews. It's like they saw a different movie or just want to be nitpicky. Enjoy the movie for what it is\, not what you think it should be. See it on the big screen.
